recipe.name: Shortbread Cookies
recipe.ingredients:
Makes about 1 1/2 dozen cookies
114 grams sugar (about 1/2 cup) 255 grams all-purpose flour (about 2 cups) 227 grams butter (1/2 pound) 1 tablespoon vanilla bean paste 1/2 teaspoon salt

step.describe:
Add all ingredients.
Repeat the blending 8 times by press "cook again", or until dough comes together in large pieces.
Form into a roll about 2 inches in diameter, wrap in plastic wrap, and refrigerate until well chilled, or overnight.

When you're ready to bake, heat the oven to 400 degrees. Slice the roll into 1/4-inch thick slices and place on two parchment-lined baking sheets. Bake until lightly browned around the edges, 12-14 minutes.
Let the cookies cool on the baking sheet for a minute or two before removing from the sheets and cooling completely on a rack.
